summary: The Sword of Truth, modeled and textured by BattleyaxStudios.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Information[/u][/b]
This mod allows you to craft the Sword of Truth from the series of books of the same name by Terry Goodkind. The sword itself is strong but, shouldn't be too overpowered, I am still working on the enchantments for it to act how it is in the books, I will update with that when I can figure it out. The forge recipe currently requires you have the Deadric smithing perk, using the same ingredients as a Deadric Sword, also requires you to forge it at the Skyforge, I may change this later depending on the feedback, I think it fair though.

The value is pretty high if you want to sell it, I mean it's a one of a kind sword with enough power to make the wielder go into a blind rage, not exactly supposed to be cheap. Why you would want to sell it is something I can't understand considering the fantastic work BattleyaxStudios did on the appearance.

[b][u]Reviews[/u][/b]
[youtube]U5LEQtxYReQ[/youtube] [youtube]TarKBvrCD6M[/youtube]

[b][u] Compatibility[/u][/b]
Should be compatible with everything really, only adds a sword currently so no reason for a conflict. There will be a quest added in a later version to get it (alternate version instead of crafting), so that may add an incompatibility.

[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
BattleyaxStudios - Model and Textures
Durge13/Neronix17 - Implementation
author: Durge13 - Neronix17 - BattleyaxStudios
